product.title: Pooh's Grand Adventure | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Pooh's Grand Adventure

It's the first day of autumn and Christopher Robin's first day of school. When he leaves a note telling Winnie the Pooh where he's going, the strangest adventure to hit the Hundred Acre Wood begins. Pooh and his friends think Christopher Robin is headed to the Forbidden Mountains where the awful Skullasaurus lives. Pooh, Piglet, and the gang steel themselves and set off to find their friend. Pooh's Grand Adventure is an original Disney story and a wonderful tale about friends finding their own strengths.

Tie-in Activity: Bookmarks are a wonderful way to encourage young children to read. Using construction paper or thin cardboard, help your child create a bear-themed bookmark of her own. Decorate with bear stickers or draw on the bookmark with crayons.
